entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: SE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
